travels.title: Molokai '13
travels.headertext: We visited Molokai with friends Allan and Crystal in October 2013. Molokai is a completely different experience than the other Hawaiian islands. It's very low key and quite undeveloped.

entry.text: Looking down at Kalaupapa. We chose to hike down (and back up) instead of riding the mules
Amazing beaches with nobody around was the norm.
